Àtụ:MedalTableTop
Oluwakemi Adekoya (amuru na ọnwa 16 Jenuarị na afọ 1993 na Lagos ) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu na- eme egwuregwu na-asọ mpi maka Bahrain
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na ihe mgbochi 400 mita ma nwee ihe kacha mma nke 54.59 nkeonwe - ndekọ Bahraini
Na Jenụwarị 2019, a kọrọ na Adekoya nwalere ihe dị mma maka stanozolol steroid n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na nnwale asọmpi na Nọvemba 2018 wee kwụsịtụrụ ya nwa oge
E wepụrụkwa nsonaazụ ya niile enwetara mgbe 24 Ọgọstụ 2018 gasịrị.
Oluwakemi Adekoya guzobe onwe ya dị ka onye mgbanaka n'ọkwa mba na Naịjirịa n'afọ 2011 wee tinye nke ise n'asọmpi Naijiria
N'afọ 2012, ọ kwalitere ike ya ruo 57.16 sekọnd iji tinye nke abụọ na Confederation of African Athletics meeting na Warri
Na afọ ahụ, ọ gbara ọsọ na ule Olympic nke Naijiria, mana o nweghi ụkpụrụ ntozu zuru oke
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ asọmpi World Junior Championship na 2012 mana ọ bụghị asọmpi
Na afọ 2013, Kemi setịpụrụ ihe kacha mma n'onwe ya nke 55.30 sekọnd, na-agba ọsọ ruo Muizat Ajoke Odumosu, onye isi ihe mgbochi Naijiria, ma tinyekwa 400 mita kacha mma nke 52.57 sekọnd
Ihe mgbochi ya kacha họọrọ ya n'ime ndị egwuregwu iri atọ kachasị ọsọ n'ụwa n'afọ ahụ
Ọsọ mbụ Adekoya nke afọ 2014 gosipụtara nnukwu mgbanwe maka ọrụ ya
Na-eme mpụta mbụ ya na sekit Njikọ Njikọ, ọ meriri ndị 400 niile m ihe mgbochi ubi na mmeri ịtụnanya
Oge ya nke 54.59 sekọnd bụ nke na-eduga n'ụwa, yana ndekọ mba Bahraini - ọ gbanwere obodo ya na steeti ọgaranya mmanụ na mbido afọ wee gosipụta ọkọlọtọ na-ekwu "I ♥ Bahrain" mgbe mmeri ya gasịrị

Ntugharị a amabeghị maka Solomon Ogba, onye isi otu Athletics Federation of Nigeria, bụ onye nọ na asọmpi ahụ na Doha wee degara International Association of Athletics Federations akwụkwọ mkpesa, na-ekwu na njem ya bụ nke enweghị usoro
Agbanyeghị, ebe ọ bụ na Adekoya edebeghị aha ya na gọọmentị mba ahụ, mba ahụ enweghị ike igbochi mmegharị ahụ

Ndị ọrụ Naijiria na ndị mgbasa ozi kwuru na nke a dị ka ihe atụ nke mba Africa na-efunahụ ndị na-eme egwuregwu n'ụlọ ha na mba ndị na-abụghị ndị Africa bara ọgaranya (ndị Nigeria sprinters Samuel Francis na Femi Ogunode abụọ kwagara Qatar )
N'ọsọ asọmpi Diamond nke abụọ ya, ọ nọ nso nke abụọ na Kaliese Spencer na Egwuregwu Bislett,  wee were ọnọdụ nke atọ na nzuko Golden Spike Ostrava

Na Satọde, 13 Ọgọst 2016 na ụbọchị 9 nke Rio 2016 Olympic Games na Brazil, Kemi gbara ọsọ kacha mma nke 50.72 iji pụta nke abụọ n'azụ Phyllis Francis nke America bụ onye gbara 50.58 sekọnd ebe ahụ site na iru eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ 3
Na Jenụwarị 2019, a kọrọ na Adekoya nwalere ihe dị mma maka stanozolol steroid n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na nnwale asọmpi na Nọvemba 2018 wee kwụsịtụrụ ya nwa oge
Nsonaazụ ya niile enwetara mgbe 24 Ọgọst 2018 gbapụrụ, gụnyere nrite ọla edo abụọ na ihe mgbochi 400 na 4x400 ngwakọta agwakọta na Egwuregwu Eshia 2018
Àtụ:Footer World Indoor Champions 400m Women
